attributes.action: Ban the sale of pure diesel in favotre of mixed with at least 5% biodiesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would cut the amount of CO2 produced from every diesel car in the country by 5% If you go a step further and say that every forcourt supplying diesel must also supply at least a 50% if not pure in the summer months the C02 affect would be cut even more.
